   23: -module(tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases
   37: -export([tls13_client_tls12_server/0,
   38:          tls13_client_tls12_server/1,
   39:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/0,
   40:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/1,
   41:          tls12_client_tls13_server/0,
   42:          tls12_client_tls13_server/1,
   43:          tls_client_tls10_server/0,
   44:          tls_client_tls10_server/1,
   45:          tls_client_tls11_server/0,
   46:          tls_client_tls11_server/1,
   47:          tls_client_tls12_server/0,
   48:          tls_client_tls12_server/1,
   49:          tls10_client_tls_server/0,
   50:          tls10_client_tls_server/1,
   51:          tls11_client_tls_server/0,
   52:          tls11_client_tls_server/1,
   53:          tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   54:          tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   55:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   56:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   57:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/0,
   58:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/1,
   59:          tls13_client_tls11_server/0,
   60:          tls13_client_tls11_server/1,
   61:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign/0,
   62:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign/1,
   63:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign/0,
   64:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign/1,
   65:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/0,
   66:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/1,
   67:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/0,
   68:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/1,
   69:          reject_legacy_cert/0,
   70:          reject_legacy_cert/1,
   71:          middle_box_tls13_client/0,
   72:          middle_box_tls13_client/1,
   73:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/0,
   74:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/1,
   75:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/0,
   76:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/1,
   77:          renegotiate_error/0,
   78:          renegotiate_error/1,
   79:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/0,
   80:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/1,
   81:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/0,
   82:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/1
   83:         ]).
   84: 
   85: 
   86: %% Test callback
   87: -export([check_session_id/2]).
   88: 
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   91: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   92: all() -> 
   93:     [
   94:      cert_groups()
   95:     ].
   96: 
   97: groups() ->
   98:     [
   99:      {rsa, [], [reject_legacy_cert | tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ++ legacy_tests()]},
  100:      {ecdsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests()}
  101:     ].
  102: 
  103: cert_groups() ->
  104:     [{group, rsa},
  105:      {group, ecdsa}].
  106: 
  107: tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ->
  108:     [tls13_client_tls12_server,
  109:      tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
  110:      tls12_client_tls13_server,
  111:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  112:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  113:      legacy_tls12_client_tls_server,
  114:      legacy_tls12_server_tls_client,
  115:      middle_box_tls13_client,
  116:      middle_box_tls12_enabled_client,
  117:      middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused,
  118:      renegotiate_error,
  119:      client_cert_fail_alert_active,
  120:      client_cert_fail_alert_passive   
  121:     ].
  122: legacy_tests() ->
  123:     [tls_client_tls10_server,
  124:      tls_client_tls11_server,
  125:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  126:      tls10_client_tls_server,
  127:      tls11_client_tls_server,
  128:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  129:      tls13_client_tls11_server,
  130:      tls13_legacy_cert_sign,
  131:      tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae,
  132:      tls12_legacy_cert_sign,
  133:      tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  137:     catch crypto:stop(),
  138:     try crypto:start() of
  139: 	ok ->
  140:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of                
  141:                 true ->
  142:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  143:                     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, erlang} | 
  144:                      Config];
  145:                 false ->
  146:                     {skip, "Insufficient crypto support for TLS-1.3"}
  147:             end
  148:     catch _:_ ->
  149: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  150:     end.
  151: 
  152: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  153:     ssl:stop(),
  154:     application:stop(crypto).
  155: 
  156: init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
  157:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  158:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  159:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  160:     [{client_type, erlang},
  161:      {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  162:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  163: init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  164:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  165:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  166:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  167:         true ->
  168:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  169:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  170:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  171:             [{client_type, erlang},
  172:              {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  173:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  174:         false ->
  175:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  176:     end.
  177: 
  178: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  179:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  180: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  181: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  182: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  183: 
  184: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  185:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  186: 
  187: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  188:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  189:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  190:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
  191:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  192:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  193:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  194: 
  195: 
  196:     
  197: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  198:      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  199:        "client has TLS 1.3 specific extensions"}].
  200: 
  201: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  202:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  203:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  204: 
  205:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  206:                   {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  207:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  208:                                     {sha256, rsa},
  209:                                     {sha256, ecdsa},
  210:                                     {sha, ecdsa}]}| ServerOpts0],
  211:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  212:                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  213:                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  214:                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  215:                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  216:                                          ecdsa_sha1]}|ClientOpts0],
  217:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  218:    
  219: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  220:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  221: 
  222: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  223:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  224:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  225:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  226:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  227:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  228:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  229: 
  230: tls_client_tls10_server() ->
  231:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.0 server."}].
  232: tls_client_tls10_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  233:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  234:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  235:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  236:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  237:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),        
  238:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  239:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  240:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  241:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  242:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  243:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')}
  244:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  245:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  246: 
  247: tls_client_tls11_server() ->
  248:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.1 server."}].
  249: tls_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  250:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  251:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  252:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  253:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  254:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  255:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  256:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  257:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  258:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  259:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,['tlsv1.1']},
  260:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  261:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')}  
  262:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  263:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  264: 
  265: tls_client_tls12_server() ->
  266:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  267: tls_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  268:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  269:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} |
  270:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  271:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  272:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  273:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  274:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  275: 
  276: tls10_client_tls_server() ->
  277:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  278: tls10_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  279:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  280:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  281:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  282:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  283:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  284:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  285:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')} |
  286:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  287:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  288:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  289:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  290:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  291:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  292: 
  293: tls11_client_tls_server() ->
  294:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.1 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  295: tls11_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  296:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  297:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  298:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  299:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  300:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  301:     
  302:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']},
  303:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')} |
  304:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  305:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  306:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  307:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  308:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  309:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  310: 
  311: tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  312:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  313: tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  314:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  315:                    ['tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  316:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  317:                    ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  318:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} |
  319:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  320:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  321: 
  322: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  323:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  324: 
  325: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  326:     SHA = ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()),
  327:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']}, {signature_algs, [{SHA, rsa}, {SHA, ecdsa}]} |
  328:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  329:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  330:                    {signature_algs, ssl:signature_algs(default, 'tlsv1.3')},
  331:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  332:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  333:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  334: 
  335: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client() ->
  336:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server."}].
  337: 
  338: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  339:     SHA = sha384,
  340:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  341:     Alg = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  342:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0, 
  343:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(Alg, [{server_chain,
  344:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  345:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  346:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]},
  347:                                                                               {client_chain,
  348:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  349:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  350:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]}
  351:                                                                              ]),
  352: 
  353:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts0],
  354:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  355:                    {signature_algs, [{SHA, Alg}]}
  356:                   | ServerOpts0],
  357:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  358: 
  359: 
  360: tls13_legacy_cert_sign() ->
  361:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to  TLS-1.3 server with pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  362: 
  363: tls13_legacy_cert_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  364:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  365:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ++ legacy_rsa_algs()}],
  366:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  367:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  368:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}],
  369: 
  370:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  371:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  372:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  373: 
  374: tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae() ->
  375:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server with legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  376: 
  377: tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  378:     ClientOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  379:                    {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  380:                    {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  381:                   ],
  382:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  383:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  384:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  385:                  ],
  386: 
  387:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  388:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  389:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  390: 
  391: tls12_legacy_cert_sign() ->
  392:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client (with old configuration) can connect to  TLS-1.2 server with pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  393: 
  394: tls12_legacy_cert_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  395:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  396:                   {signature_algs, rsa_algs()}],
  397:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  398:                   {signature_algs, rsa_algs()}],
  399: 
  400:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  401:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  402:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  403: 
  404: tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae() ->
  405:     [{doc,"Test that a modern TLS 1.2 client can connect to TLS-1.2 server with legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  406: 
  407: tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  408:     ClientOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  409:                    {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ++ rsa_algs()}
  410:                   ],
  411:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  412:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  413:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  414:                  ],
  415: 
  416:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  417:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  418:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  419: 
  420: reject_legacy_cert() ->
  421:     [{doc,"Test that client sends empty cert if does only have legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert that is not supported by the server"
  422:       "and do not make connection with client that requires better cert and only option is legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  423: 
  424: reject_legacy_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  425:     reject_legacy_cert('tlsv1.3', certificate_required, Config),
  426:     reject_legacy_cert('tlsv1.2', handshake_failure, Config).
  427: 
  428: reject_legacy_cert(Version, Alert, Config) ->
  429:     COpts =  [{signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs() ++ rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  430:               {versions, [Version]}
  431:              ],
  432:     SOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
  433:              {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  434:              {signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs()},
  435:              {versions, [Version]}
  436:             ],
  437:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  438:       server_config := ServerOpts0} =
  439:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{client_chain =>
  440:                                         #{root => root_key(sha256),
  441:                                           intermedites => intermediates(sha256, 1),
  442:                                           peer => peer_key(sha256)}, 
  443:                                     server_chain => 
  444:                                         #{root => root_key(sha256, ssl_test_lib:pss_params(sha256)),
  445:                                           intermedites => intermediates(sha256, 
  446:                                                                         ssl_test_lib:pss_params(sha256), 
  447:                                                                         1),
  448:                                           peer => peer_key(sha256, ssl_test_lib:pss_params(sha256))
  449:                                          }}),   
  450:     ClientOpts = ClientOpts0 ++ COpts,
  451:     ServerOpts = ServerOpts0 ++ SOpts,
  452:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, Alert),
  453:     RevClientOpts = ServerOpts0 ++ [{signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs()}],
  454:     RevServerOtps = ClientOpts0 ++ [{signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs() ++ rsa_pss_rsae_algs()}],
  455:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(RevClientOpts,  RevServerOtps, Config, insufficient_security).
  456: 
  457: middle_box_tls13_client() ->
  458:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  459: middle_box_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  460:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  461:                    ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  462:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  463:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  464:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  465:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  466: 
  467: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client() ->
  468:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 enabled client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  469: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  470:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  471:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  472:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  473:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  474:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  475: 
  476: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused() ->
  477:     [{doc, "Test that TLS-1.3 middlebox enabled client can reuse TLS-1.2 session when talking to TLS-1.2 server"}].
  478: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  479:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  480:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  481:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  482: 
  483:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  484: 					{from, self()},
  485:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  486:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  487:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  488:     {_Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  489:                                                   {host, Hostname},
  490:                                                   {from, self()},
  491:                                                   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  492:                                                   {options,
  493:                                                    [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),
  494:     Server ! listen,
  495:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [session_id, session_data]),
  496:     {_Client1, CSock1}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
  497:                                                      {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  498:                                                      {host, Hostname},
  499:                                                      {from, self()},
  500:                                                      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  501:                                                      {options,
  502:                                                       [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  503:                                                        {middlebox_comp_mode, true},
  504:                                                        {reuse_session, {SessionId, SessData}} | ClientOpts]}]),
  505:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}]}  = ssl:connection_information(CSock1, [session_id]).
  506: 
  507: renegotiate_error() ->
  508:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned when ssl:renegotiate/1 is called on a connection running TLS-1.3"}].
  509: renegotiate_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  510:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  511:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  512:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  513: 
  514:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  515: 					{from, self()},
  516:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  517:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  518:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  519:     Options = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts],
  520:     case ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, Options) of
  521:         {ok, Socket} ->
  522:             {error, notsup} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket);
  523:         {error, Reason} ->
  524:             ct:fail(Reason)
  525:     end.
  526: 
  527: client_cert_fail_alert_active() ->
  528:     [{doc, "Check that we receive alert message"}].
  529: client_cert_fail_alert_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  530:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  531:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  532:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  533:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  534:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  535: 
  536:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "clinet_invalid_cert.pem"),
  537:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  538: 
  539:     ClientOpts = [{active, true},
  540:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  541:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  542:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  543:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  544:                                         {from, self()},
  545:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  546:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  547:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  548:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  549:     receive
  550:         {Server, {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}}} ->
  551:             receive
  552:                 {ssl_error, Socket, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}} ->
  553:                     ok
  554:             after 500 ->
  555:                     ct:fail(no_acticv_msg)
  556:             end
  557:     end.
  558: 
  559: client_cert_fail_alert_passive() ->
  560:     [{doc, "Check that recv or setopts return alert"}].
  561: client_cert_fail_alert_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  562:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  563:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  564:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  565:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  566:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  567: 
  568:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  569:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  570: 
  571:     ClientOpts = [{active, false},
  572:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  573:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  574:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  575:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, recv,
  576:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  577:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, setopts,
  578:                   ServerNode, Hostname).
  579: 
  580: tls13_client_tls11_server() ->
  581:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client gets old server alert from TLS 1.0 server."}].
  582: tls13_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  583:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  584:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  585:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
  586: 
  587: 
  588: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  589: %% Internal functions and callbacks -----------------------------------
  590: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  591: 
  592: middlebox_test(Mode, Expected, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
  593:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  594:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  595: 					{from, self()},
  596:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  597:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  598:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  599:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  600: 					{host, Hostname},
  601:                                         {from, self()},
  602:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  603:                                         {options,
  604:                                          [{middlebox_comp_mode, Mode}| ClientOpts]}]),
  605:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  606: 
  607: check_session_id(Socket, Expected) ->
  608:    {ok, [{session_id, SessionId}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [session_id]),
  609:     case {Expected, SessionId} of
  610:         {empty, <<>>} ->
  611:             ok;
  612:         {not_empty, SessionId} when SessionId =/= <<>> ->
  613:             ok;
  614:         _ ->
  615:             {nok, {{expected, Expected}, {got, SessionId}}}
  616:     end.
  617: 
  618: alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, Function,
  619:               ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  620:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  621:                                         {from, self()},
  622:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  623:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  624:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  625:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  626:     ct:sleep(500),
  627:     case Function of
  628:         recv ->
  629:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0);
  630:         setopts ->
  631:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}])
  632:     end.
  633: 
  634: create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts) ->
  635:     KeyFile =  proplists:get_value(keyfile, ClientOpts),
  636:     [KeyEntry] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(KeyFile),
  637:     Key = ssl_test_lib:public_key(public_key:pem_entry_decode(KeyEntry)),
  638:     ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  639: 
  640:     [{'Certificate', ClientDerCert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  641:     ClientOTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(ClientDerCert, otp),
  642:     ClientOTPTbsCert = ClientOTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  643:     NewClientDerCert = public_key:pkix_sign(ClientOTPTbsCert, Key),
  644:     ssl_test_lib:der_to_pem(NewClientCertFile, [{'Certificate', NewClientDerCert, not_encrypted}]).
  645: 
  646: test_rsa_pcks1_cert(SHA, COpts, SOpts, Config) ->
  647:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  648:       server_config := ServerOpts} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => root_key(SHA),
  649:                                                                                    intermediates => intermediates(SHA, 1),
  650:                                                                                    peer => peer_key(SHA)},
  651:                                                                  client_chain => #{root => root_key(SHA),
  652:                                                                                    intermediates => intermediates(SHA, 1),
  653:                                                                                    peer => peer_key(SHA)}}),
  654:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts ++ ClientOpts, SOpts ++ ServerOpts, Config).
  655: 
  656: 
  657: root_key(SHA) ->
  658:     root_key(SHA, undefined).
  659: 
  660: peer_key(SHA) ->
  661:     peer_key(SHA, undefined).
  662: 
  663: intermediates(SHA, N) ->
  664:     intermediates(SHA, undefined, N).
  665: 
  666: root_key(SHA, undefined) ->
  667:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  668:     [{digest, SHA},{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}];
  669: root_key(SHA, Params) ->
  670:     [{digest, SHA}, {key, {ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6), Params}}].
  671: 
  672: peer_key(SHA, undefined) ->
  673:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  674:     [{digest, SHA}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}];
  675: peer_key(SHA, Params) ->
  676:      [{digest, SHA}, {key, {ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5), Params}}].
  677: 
  678: intermediates(SHA, undefined, N) when N =< 2 ->
  679:     Default = lists:duplicate(N, [{digest, SHA}]),
  680:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  681:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Default, N, []);
  682: intermediates(SHA, Params, N) when N =< 2 ->
  683:     Default = lists:duplicate(N, [{digest, SHA}]),
  684:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  685:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Default, Params, N, []).
  686: 
  687: hardcode_rsa_keys([], 0, Acc) ->
  688:     Acc;
  689: hardcode_rsa_keys([Head | Tail], N, Acc) ->
  690:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Tail, N-1, [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(N)} | Head] | Acc]).
  691: 
  692: hardcode_rsa_keys([], _, 0, Acc) ->
  693:     Acc;
  694: hardcode_rsa_keys([Head | Tail], Params, N, Acc) ->
  695:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Tail, N-1, [[{key, {ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(N)}, Params} | Head] | Acc]).
  696: 
  697: rsa_algs() ->
  698:     [{sha512, rsa}, {sha384, rsa}, {sha256, rsa}].
  699: 
  700: legacy_rsa_algs() ->
  701:     [rsa_pkcs1_sha512,rsa_pkcs1_sha384,rsa_pkcs1_sha256].
  702: 
  703: rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ->
  704:     [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,rsa_pss_rsae_sha256].
  705: 
  706: rsa_pss_pss_algs() ->
  707:     [rsa_pss_pss_sha512,rsa_pss_pss_sha384,rsa_pss_pss_sha256].
